Scripts.OnVerticalScroll: if PawnIsWoW3() then -- *** WoW 3.0 version FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(PawnUIFrame_StatsList, offset, 16, PawnUIFrame_StatsList_Update) else -- *** WoW 2.4 version FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(16, PawnUIFrame_StatsList_Update) end

Scripts.OnMouseUp: if button == "RightButton" then PawnUICompareItemShortcut_OnClick(1, button) end
if button == "RightButton" then PawnUICompareItemShortcut_OnClick(2, button) end

Scripts.OnLoad: this:RegisterEvent("VARIABLES_LOADED") this:RegisterEvent("ADDON_LOADED") this:RegisterEvent("UPDATE_BINDINGS") PawnUITabList = { PawnUIScalesTabPage, PawnUICompareTabPage, PawnUIOptionsTabPage, PawnUIAboutTabPage, PawnUIHelpTabPage } PanelTemplates_SetNumTabs(PawnUIFrame, #PawnUITabList)
Scripts.OnShow: PlaySound("igCharacterInfoOpen") if not PawnUIOpenedYet then PawnUIOpenedYet = true if not PawnOptions.ShownGettingStarted then PawnOptions.ShownGettingStarted = true PawnUISwitchToTab(5) else PawnUISwitchToTab(1) end end
